info.tagline: Working at the intersection of web development & design

about.title: I specialize in front-end development and web design. I have a strong design background and a CS major BSc degree, with over 8 years of experience.
about.paragraph: I bring over 8 years of diverse experience, including 3 years in agencies and over 5 years of freelancing. I excel as both a web designer and front-end developer, proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, Git/SEMVer versioning, with knowledge in CI/CD practices. My mastery extends to various web technologies, accessibility, analytics, testing, along with proficiency in React, Next.js, WordPress, and Kirby-style CMS platforms. I prioritize perfectionism in both coding and design, emphasizing polish, readability, accessibility, and performance. I have previously collaborated with folks from marketing and design in previous roles.
